fields.label: Hero Gallery
fields.name: hero_gallery
fields.instructions: 1920 x 1080 (16:9) is required for first image.

fields.label: Top Snippet
fields.name: top_snippet
fields.instructions: To appear in result item cards, and as the sub-text to the product page title

fields.label: Highlights
fields.name: highlights
fields.instructions: 3-4 highlights that appear at beginning of content

fields.label: Variant Title
fields.name: variant_title
fields.instructions: To override the automatically generated variant name, use this field.

fields.label: Show Itinerary Note
fields.name: show_itinerary_note
fields.instructions: Check to enable a display under the map that highlights an important detail about the itinerary like reverse routes or exceptions

fields.label: Itinerary Note
fields.name: itinerary_note
fields.instructions: Important detail about the itinerary like reverse routes or exceptions

fields.label: Map GeoJSON
fields.name: geojson
fields.instructions: Generate geoJSON at https://geojson.io/ use 'royalblue' for flight lines, and 'darkcyan' for cruise lines

fields.label: Has Variants
fields.name: has_variants
fields.instructions: Enable itinerary variants - in TourTrack the first 'season' will match with the first variant, the second season will match with the second variant and so on. The default itinerary will match with anything else

sub_fields.label: Variant Title
sub_fields.name: variant_title
sub_fields.instructions: To override the automatically generated variant name, use this field.

sub_fields.label: GeoJSON
sub_fields.name: geojson
sub_fields.instructions: Generate geoJSON at https://geojson.io/ use 'royalblue' for flight lines, and 'darkcyan' for cruise lines

fields.label: Use Automation
fields.name: use_automation
fields.instructions: UNDER DEVELOPMENT Do not enable until automation exists for itinerary

fields.label: Automation Itinerary ID
fields.name: automation_itinerary_id
fields.instructions: Enter the GUID of the itinerary from the system

fields.label: Automation Extra Deals
fields.name: automation_extra_deals
fields.instructions: Manually add dates here for any special departures

sub_fields.label: Deal
sub_fields.name: deal
sub_fields.instructions: Select the extra deal / special departure

sub_fields.label: Overwrite Default
sub_fields.name: overwrite_default
sub_fields.instructions: If checked this will overwrite a default deal found on the date

sub_fields.label: Deals
sub_fields.name: deals
sub_fields.instructions: Select all deals that apply to this departure

sub_fields.label: Variant
sub_fields.name: variant
sub_fields.instructions: Leave blank if departure is the default itinerary configuration. Otherwise use the number of the itinerary variant starting from 1

fields.label: Search Rank
fields.name: search_rank
fields.instructions: Weight given to search priority, from 1-1000. A higher number will appear first in search results. A product with a weight of 1 will appear last. Score average products: ~500 range, products to appear first: 700+ range, products to rank last: sub 300 range.

fields.label: Show Notification
fields.name: show_notification
fields.instructions: Check to display a notification message on page load
